text: Motion
Motion

Phew...
Producer, how was it?

You were focused,
and your movements were sharp.

It really comes across that
you value each practice session.
Ahaha, thank you.

...If we don't do well,
we can't perform as a unit, right?

And it's not good for you,
the producer, to watch us like this!

Haha, I appreciate you saying that,
but you don't have to worry about me.

No, no~
It's not about worrying or anything like that.

I just want the producer to always
see the serious side of me.
Something like thatâ™ª

I see.
But, are there times when Mei isn't serious?
At least, I've never seen it.

Hey, don't expose me like that...
Um... What was it... Something like praising too much...
Overpraising, maybe?
Yeah, overpraising! That's it!

That's it. Before I became an idol,
I was pretty laid back every day.

If the producer hadn't scouted me,
I'd probably still be like that.

So, to show my gratitude,
I want to show you how serious I am~
